title: Grovers
description: Grovers benchmark schema definition, describing parameters for the benchmark.

benchmark_name.description: Name of the benchmark. Must be 'Grovers' for this schema.

shots.description: Number of measurement shots (repetitions) to use for each circuit in the benchmark.

min_qubits.description: Minimum number of qubits to start generating circuits for the benchmark.

max_qubits.description: Maxiumum number of qubits to stop generating circuits for the benchmark.

skip_qubits.description: The step size for generating circuits from the min to max qubit sizes.

max_circuits.description: Maximum number of circuits generated for each qubit size in the benchmark.

use_mcx_shim.description: For validating the implementation of an mcx shim.
